algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the score for each bin by taking the product of the logarithm of the item size divided by the remaining capacity of each bin and the square root of the maximum capacity divided by the sum of the remaining capacities of all the bins.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item: int, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    remaining_capacities_sum = np.sum(bins)
    
    log_item_size = np.log(item)
    sqrt_max_capacity = np.sqrt(max_capacity)
    scores = (log_item_size / bins) * (sqrt_max_capacity / remaining_capacities_sum)
    
    return scores
